Straight up this game needs a re-balance or the killers need some sort of nerf. The only way to get away is to cheese them into stupid exploited chases or get a killer who doesn't know what they're doing. They move way too fast to outrun, or vault over an obstacle. Even if you do vault they can still hit you four feet from the other side of the window or obstacle anyway. Cool concept but poorly executed.
EDIT: this game needs a lot more re-balancing than just the hit boxes and movement. Wiggling is useless unless the killer doesn't know where the hooks are. and some of the way killers are structured is overwhelmingly poor. The spirit for instance has a glitchy look when moving and can be hard to notice because of it, and legion just cheeses his stab because he can move 4x faster than you in the first place. Stuns after wiggling are less than a mere second making the killer on your ass again before you even get 3 feet away. The biggest issue I have currently is being hit when im a good distance on the other side of a pallet, and then not being able to hit someone the same when im playing as killer. The game in my opinion is broken. Even though I'm still a learner, I should not be having this much of an issue.

오랜만에 데바데 해볼려고 설치했습니다. 그런데 평가가 부정적이며 패치에 대한 불만이 많더군요. 에이 설마 하면서 게임을 설치한 저는 서둘러 생존자를 눌렀지만 15분이 넘도록 안잡히길래 " 이 머선..?123;; "을 외치며 살인마를 썼습니다. 살인마는 1분도 안지나서 잡히고, 살인마  20구간임에도 불구하고 생존자들이 놀려먹을려고 찾아와서 티배깅해주고... 아 맞다 원래 그런게임이였지만, 패치한 꼬라지보니까 게임 삭제합니다. 패치가 원래 게임을 박살내는 용도였던가..?
